percent_poor_ment_hlth_days_14_and_over:.long_name: Percent of the population with poor mental health
percent_poor_ment_hlth_days_14_and_over:.short_description: Percent of the population self-reporting poor mental health
percent_poor_ment_hlth_days_14_and_over:.long_description: Percent of the population self-reporting poor mental health in over 14 days of the previous month. Based on the Virginia Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance Survey.
percent_poor_ment_hlth_days_14_and_over:.statement: {value} of the population in {features.name} reports poor mental health.

sources.name: Virginia Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System
